Comment: From the decision:  >More specifically, in this context, AEA detainees must receive notice after the date of this order that they are subject to removal under the Act. The notice must be afforded within a reasonable time and in such a manner as will allow them to actually seek habeas relief in the proper venue before such removal occurs.  You're not wrong though that the administration will try to stretch the line as far as they can.
